short_description: Discover Canada, the second-largest country in the world, where stunning natural beauty meets vibrant multicultural cities. Experience the majestic Rocky Mountains, pristine lakes, world-class cities like Toronto and Vancouver, and the warm hospitality of the Canadian people.

health.tap_water_safety: Safe to drink - Canada has excellent water quality
health.alcohol_consumption_age: 19 years old (18 in Alberta, Manitoba, Quebec)
health.alcohol_parchase_age: 19 years old (18 in Alberta, Manitoba, Quebec)
alcohol_info: Legal drinking age is 19 in most provinces and territories, 18 in Alberta, Manitoba, and Quebec
It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the legal age
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, liquor stores, and some grocery stores (varies by province)

tipping.hotels: Tipping is appreciated for porters ($1-2 per bag) and housekeeping ($2-5 per day)
tipping.guides: 10-15% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: 15-20% tip is customary for good service

weather.title: Canada has diverse climates ranging from arctic in the north to temperate in the south. The country experiences four distinct seasons, with cold winters and warm summers in most regions, while the west coast has a milder maritime climate.

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm temperatures perfect for exploring cities, hiking in national parks, and outdoor activities. Ideal time to visit Vancouver, Toronto, and the Rocky Mountains. Great for festivals and outdoor adventures

when_to_visit.title: Spring & Autumn
when_to_visit.time_period: April to May, September to October
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild temperatures with beautiful seasonal colors, especially during fall foliage. Perfect for sightseeing, exploring cities, and enjoying outdoor activities without the summer crowds. Great time for visiting national parks

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Cold temperatures, especially in central and eastern regions. Perfect for winter sports like skiing and snowboarding in the Rockies and Quebec. Great time to experience winter festivals and activities

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Canada depends on the region and activities, but generally summer (June to August) offers warm weather for outdoor activities, while spring and autumn provide mild temperatures and beautiful seasonal colors
